abstract: Valeant Pharmaceuticals shares drop 16.5 percent after sharp price increases on heart drugs Isuprel and Nitropress are questioned by House Democrats, who call for hearing on matter and subpoena of related documents.
lead_paragraph: Democratic lawmakers denounced “massive” price increases of two heart drugs from Valeant Pharmaceuticals, fueling a retreat from drug maker shares.

headline.main: Democrats on House Panel Attack Heart Drug Price Increases
headline.print_headline: Democrats on House Panel Attack Heart Drug Increases

snippet: Democratic lawmakers denounced “massive” price increases of two heart drugs from Valeant Pharmaceuticals, fueling a retreat from drug maker shares.
